definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ps 73:26 flesh (perh. orig. the inner flesh, full of blood, next the bones, cf. Hoffm:ZAW iii (1883), 107, and [[בָּשָׂר]] = (orig.) flesh next the. skin);—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Ps 78:20, Ps 78:27, cstr. Mic 3:3 +, sf. [[שְׁאֵרִי]] Je 51:35, Ps 73:26, etc;—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig. for physical power Ps 73:26 (+ [[לֵבָב]]), Pr 5:11 (+ [[בָּשָׂר]]).

in HP = flesh- (= blood-) relation (i.e. one near of kin):[[שְׁאֵר]] [[אָבִיךָ]] Le 18:12 cf, v:Le 18:13, Le 20:19, also Le 18:17 (read [[שְׁאֵרְךָ]] for [[שַׁאֲרָה]] LXX Ew Dr-Wh;cf. of. Di Baen); + [[אֵלָיו הַקָּרׂב]] Le 21:2, Nu 27:11 [[בְשָׂרוֹ]] ´[[שׁ]]: Le 18:6, Le 25:49.
